card_landmark_utility:
Acquire special upgrade items
For example: By obtaining upgrade items, you can upgrade the accessories of Otter NFT, which will make your NFT more scarce.
label_landmark_introduction: In the name of Mimir, let the equipment that protects the otters receive the blessing of wisdom. Once the symbols power emerge, people will admire them for their existence: you have runestones to upgrade equipment. Your equipment will become full of energy, and its potential will be realized. This state will bring you attention and glory.
